name: RabbitMQ Memory Usage is critical on node
description: RabbitMQ Memory Usage rate exceeds the configured threshold

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. **Check RabbitMQ Server Logs**: Look for any error messages or warnings related to memory usage in the server logs. These messages may provide information about the cause of the issue.

2. **Inspect Queues and Channels**: Check the number of messages and channels in use by your application. High numbers of messages or channels can consume significant amounts of memory. You
